artist: Artist: Yamamura Kōka (Toyonari); Publisher: Watanabe Shōzaburō
creditline: Anonymous gift in honor of Gordon Brodfuehrer
description: side profile of male actor with black cap and navy blue robe; off white background with subtle silver shimmer
markings: LL publisher\'s seal in black: 板 | date seal: 大正八 {Taishō hachi} (1919)
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
text: Based on Ichikawa Danshirō II (1855-1922) as Henmi Tesshinsai 逸見鐵心齋 in the play Otokodate harusame gasa 侠客春雨傘, performed at the Kabuki Theater, January 1917.
title: Actor Ichikawa Danshirō II as Henmi Tesshinsai
